metadata.title: CVE-2023-1072 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from9.0 before 15.7.8, all versions starting from 15.8 before 15.8.4, allversions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.2. It was possible to trigger aresource depletion attack due to improper filtering for number of requeststo read commits details.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
